name: Akita: King Pig Thinks Pink
storyline: Strange things are happening in Fansia. An enveloping mischievous pink gas is turning everyone who breathes it into a monster that does not hesitate to attack the most defenseless. The fearsome King Pig is the one behind all this, sending his minions throughout the kingdom to transform its inhabitants into monsters! Many brave heroes have set out to hunt down the monsters and defeat the evil King Pig, but none have succeeded.
summary: Explore a fantasy world inhabited by charming creatures, with 2D hand-drawn animations. For 1 player or 2 players cooperatively.
